toc.value: Creating S3 Bucket in LocalStack with Docker Compose.
Creating an Application With Spring Cloud AWS S3

frontMatter.title: Spring Cloud AWS 3.0 S3 with Spring Boot and Localstack
frontMatter.author: Amrut Prabhu
frontMatter.summary: In this article, we will look into how we can use Spring Cloud AWS S3 in a Spring Boot Application to communicate with AWS. We will run our setup with LocalStack to mock the actual AWS S3 service

prev.title: Distributed Tracing With OpenTelemetry and Jaeger In Spring Boot3
prev.author: Amrut Prabhu
prev.summary: In this article, we will look at how we can export distributed traces using Opentelemetry to Jaeger from a Spring Boot Application

next.title: Spring Boot 3 Docker Compose Support
next.author: Amrut Prabhu
next.summary: We will have a look at the new Spring Boot 3.1 feature supporting Docker Compose files on startup. No need to start Docker compose separately again
